page.title: 19Recreation.
page.content: We did a survey of the children in our school to see what were their parents' favourite pastimes and hobbies. There are no real sports facilities in our block,but the area is very suitable for walking,bird watching and nature watching. These activities proved to be very popular among the grown-ups. Another popular pastime was gerdening,which we found surprising as some grown-ups complain about it! Those grown-ups interested in Sport, mainly golf,tennis,badminton and squash,have to travel into different areas to play. These are not very far away,between two and five miles. Children's pastimes include Brownies, Cubs,ballet,BMX,roller skating,football and swimming.About half of these activities can be done in the village of Uley.
